thread.title: BRIEF-Trecora Resources Says Effective March 6, Nicholas N. Carter Was Temporarily Appointed Executive Chairman

title: BRIEF-Trecora Resources Says Effective March 6, Nicholas N. Carter Was Temporarily Appointed Executive Chairman

organizations.name: was temporarily appointed executive chairman reuters

text: March 8, 2018 / 4:31 PM / Updated 23 minutes ago BRIEF-Trecora Resources Says Effective March 6, Nicholas N. Carter Was Temporarily Appointed Executive Chairman Reuters Staff 1 Min Read March 8 (Reuters) - Trecora Resources: * TRECORA RESOURCES SAYS EFFECTIVE MARCH 6, 2018, NICHOLAS N. CARTER WAS TEMPORARILY APPOINTED EXECUTIVE CHAIRMAN OF THE COMPANY -SEC FILING‍​ * TRECORA RESOURCES SAYS PRIOR TO THIS APPOINTMENT, CARTER SERVED AS THE COMPANY’S NON-EXECUTIVE CHAIRMAN OF THE BOARD * TRECORA RESOURCES SAYS SIMON UPFILL-BROWN, CO’S CURRENT PRESIDENT AND CEO, WILL NOW SERVE AS CEO AND CHIEF OPERATING OFFICER OF COMPANY * TRECORA RESOURCES SAYS EFFECTIVE MARCH 6, 2018, CO ELIMINATED POSITION OF VICE PRESIDENT OF MANUFACTURING, ROLE CURRENTLY HELD BY RONALD FRANKLIN Source text - ( bit.ly/2oTuuXH ) Further company coverage:
